entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLEAR
PATCHY FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 70
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING NORTH AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTH AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

CLEAR, HOT

HIGHS IN THE UPPER 90S

MOSTLY CLEAR

HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
